data.meta_description: We the loyal and proud associates of Eyemart Express are living in fear of contracting or bringing home the Coronavirus to our loved ones. data.text: We the loyal and proud associates of Eyemart Express are living in fear of contracting or bringing home the Coronavirus to our loved ones. Please consider helping us by closing stores down and paying your associates. We don't believe that it is right to have to use our earned Vacation time to protect ourselves from this horrible pandemic. Please show your associates that you care for them and their families and do what is right in protecting them. We understand we are taking precautions, sometimes precautions are not enough. When we do measurements there is no way to protect ourselves from the invisible dangers that can be. Please consider gliding us through with some type of pay besides our earned PTO for a couple of weeks until this all calms down. Thank you
